metadata.Title: CVE-2016-5418 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
The sandboxing code in libarchive 3.2.0 and earlier mishandles hardlinkarchive entries of non-zero data size, which might allow remote attackersto write to arbitrary files via a crafted archive file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-5418` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

bsdcpio - 3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.3
bsdtar - 3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.3
libarchive13 - 3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libarchive package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.1.2-11ubuntu0.16.04.3').
